subject: Halls of Fame
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Herb Brooks, the Miracle on Ice coach, and Patrick Roy, the goaltender with the most N.H.L. career victories, highlight the newest class of the Hockey Hall of Fame.
snippet: Herb Brooks, the Miracle on Ice coach, and Patrick Roy, the goaltender with the most N.H.L. career victories, highlight the newest class of the Hockey Hall of Fame.
